column3: Can we s/Proof/CProof/ to keep naming consistent?\n

Bringing description from #4793 here:

Following @laanwj 's advice of only moving ScanHash, I found another solution to encapsulate the miner's pow without removing the miner's optimization, which was rejected in #4423 
But I would like to slightly change the behavior.
Commit "Replace proof.nNonce >= 0xffff000 with an iteration counter" should be either rejected or squashed into "proof.nNonce

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4794_d93c180cdf32141f857c1d61c2e85cae8406ec6f/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
